title: Manage Appraisal Process
description: The TC needs to coordinate the property appraisal for a financed transaction.

tasks.description: Confirm with the buyer's lender that the appraisal has been ordered.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets confirmation from the lender that the appraisal order is placed.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the listing agent to ensure the appraiser has access to the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Access for the appraiser is scheduled and confirmed.

tasks.description: Follow up with the lender to obtain the appraisal report and track the appraisal contingency deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the report, confirms the value, and marks the contingency as complete.
